channel.title: How to change hits
channel.description: I was wondering how I improve a items hits like dds also how would I change how a item is held?

item.title: How to change hits
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

I agree with both of you, but also the Statistic is often a root factor of the Calculated Formula. Double check that if you’re going to edit anything.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change hits
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

Rocket is correct, however I feel I should add that it may be your MaxHit formula that is shockingly bad and isn’t correctly calculating your maximum hit well enough

Read full topic

item.title: How to change hits
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

One way would be to modify the “Strength” Statistic value in your file which holds Item information and Statistics. In most files, It’s the second-to-last value (last is Prayer). You can change the way a weapon is held via Client, or defining it a certain way such as an Abyssal Whip Server-sided.

Read full topic
